QuestData.Title: The Trainer's Challenge: Big Bao
QuestData.Description: Are you ready for another lesson, $n?$B$BToday, you will spar against Big Bao. He is large of stature and of heart, and he will not give up until he is wholly beaten.$B$BIf you wish to defeat him, you will need to persevere.$B$BSpeak to him in the training ring to begin the challenge. Good luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Big Bao, then defeat him.
